casebody.data:
NC FARM PARTNERSHIP
v.
PIG IMPROVEMENT. No. 156P04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 24, 2004. Jack Cozort, John J. Butler, Raleigh, Charles T. Patterson, Margaret M. Prahl, Sioux City, IA, for Pig Improvement Co., Inc. Ronald H. Garber, John T. Benjamin, Jr., Raleigh, for NC Farm Partnership et al. William G. Hancock, K. Matthew Vaughn, Raleigh, for NC Biosciences Organization, Embrex, Inc. Johnny M. Loper, Rachel Krevans, San Francisco, for ViaGen, Inc. John J. Butler, Raleigh, Rachel G. Lattimore, Washington, DC, for Biotechnology Industry Org.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 2nd day of April 2004 by Hubbard LLC for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Dismissed as moot. Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i). By order of the Court in conference this the 24th day of June 2004."
